headline.main: R.A.F. FIGHTERS RAKE NAZI UNITS IN FRANCE; Netherland Pilot Bombs Ship in Convoy Off Norway

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 17 (AP) -- Royal Air Force fighters carried out "several lightning attacks" on occupied France today and left thick smoke pouring from three targets at one place, Air Ministry sources said.
abstract: Brit radio describes bombing of supply ship in German convoy off south Norway by Netherlands pilot
snippet: LONDON, Nov. 17 (AP) -- Royal Air Force fighters carried out "several lightning attacks" on occupied France today and left thick smoke pouring from three targets at one place, Air Ministry sources said....
